spell_list.description: Inflicts mental damage surrounding the primary target of the spell. For every target the spell hits, the illusionist gets an increment of Mystic Illusion, which deals additional damage with the next attack and restore some power to the group. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the reuse time. Mystic Illusion can increment up to 6 times.
spell_list.description_pvp: Inflicts mental damage surrounding the primary target of the spell. For every target the spell hits, the illusionist gets an increment of Mystic Illusion, which deals additional damage with the next attack and restore some power to the group. Higher ranks of this ability reduce the reuse time. Mystic Illusion can increment up to 6 times.

effect_list.description: Applies Mystic Illusion.  Lasts for 30.0 seconds.
On any combat or spell hit this spell will cast Mystic Illusion on target of attack.
Increases power of group members (AE) by 2 - 3
Inflicts 3 - 5 mental damage on targets in Area of Effect

spell_list.name: Chromatic Illusion
